title: OpenAI launches Prism, a new AI workspace for scientists
description: OpenAI has launched a new scientific workspace program called Prism, which integrates AI into existing standards for composing research papers.
content: OpenAI has launched a new scientific workspace program called Prism, which integrates AI into existing standards for composing research papers.
